channel.title: [PI] Maybe making Right-Click transparent?
channel.description:
Hey everyone. What I mean is, when you right click on someone's name, and the options come up, is it possible to make that like transparent so you can see through it? But see the writing aswell if you know what I mean?
Like this; [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/23itt6u.png[/img]
Thanks in advance.
